task.name: TalkToALPHA
task.description: Talk to ALPHA to get information about your current time period.

task.name: AKWorkshop
task.description: Find Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi at his workshop south of the time machine.

task.name: TalkToAK
task.description: Talk to Muhammad ibn Musa al-Khwarizmi to get an idea of who he was and what he did.

task.name: MSForge1
task.description: Find the metalsmith at his forge in the north west corner of this district.

task.name: TalkToMS1
task.description: Talk to the metalsmith and get the astrolabe part.

task.name: GiveBPart
task.description: Give the astrolabe part to al-Khwarizmi.

task.name: MSForge2
task.description: Return the broken part to the metalsmith.

task.name: TalkToMS2
task.description: Talk to the metalsmith to track down the functioning astrolabe part.

task.name: CTMarket
task.description: Go to the market in the south west corner of the district.

task.name: TalkToCT
task.description: Talk to the cartographer to receive the functioning astrolabe part.

task.name: GiveGPart
task.description: Give the functioning astrolabe part to al-Khwarizmi.

task.name: Leave
task.description: Talk to ALPHA to travel to the next time period.
